title: A January Dandelion - last four lines imply

content.question: The last four lines of the poem (“When . . . been”) primarily imply that

choices.label: the bereft heart lives but will never recover from its loss
unlike the dandelion, the human heart will ultimately prevail
even when love is gone, the beauty it leaves behind remains
sorrow and lost potential are the inevitable consequences of love

content.answer: the bereft heart lives but will never recover from its loss

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
